item.title: Facebook Streamlining Application Authorization
item.description: Facebook have announced to developers that they are going to remove the installation requirement screen and allow users to try an application before installing it. What this means is that users won't see the intimidating list of checkboxes to try an application out, and will get to install the application afterwards. This was meant as a preventative measure against spammy methods used by some applications. The developer announcement described the migration to the new requirements.
